description: Detects remote RPC calls to create or execute a scheduled task via ATSvc Author: Sagie Dulce, Dekel Paz. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Schedule Task Lateral Movement via ATSvc
query: (EventLog:"RPCFW" AND winlog.event_id:"3" AND InterfaceUuid:"1ff70682\-0a51\-30e8\-076d\-740be8cee98b" AND OpNum:("0" OR "1"))
